images.copyright: Basilica of San Francesco di Paola, Naples, Italy (© javarman3/Getty Images)
images.title: The dome of Piazza del Plebiscito
images.caption: Basilica of San Francesco di Paola, Naples, Italy
images.desc: Walk into any large square in Naples, Italy, and the city's history comes into focus. Arched galleries, sweeping colonnades, and domes that echo ancient architecture compete for your attention. Every street shifts in style—compact Baroque facades give way to broad Neoclassical courtyards. Continue exploring, and you will arrive at a wide square with a building that appears Roman at first sight. That's the Basilica of San Francesco di Paola, located on the west side of Piazza del Plebiscito.
images.bsTitle: The dome of Piazza del Plebiscito
